## RouterFactory.shutdownAll() method

Shutdown all active routers (for graceful shutdown) This method should be called when the application receives termination signal

**Signature:**

```typescript
shutdownAll(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
